Articles.Content:
My dramatisation of Kerbal Space Program let me know what you think or suggestions.

The Kerbals and I have come up against an unstoppable force, no not star wars but the update of Kerbal Space Program to 0.90.

In the Update the KSC is sold and I loose my job, also our three brave Kerbals Bill, Doodmon and Ludwell crash land on Duna, why? well we just sold the tracking station.

Don't worry though Altery Kerman saves the day and hopfully he will help save the Kerbals on Duna, but first things first he has to rebuild the Kerbalinian Odyssey program. But unknown by the Kerbals at the KSC theres a Keep Kerbals on Kerbin society or K.O.K for short are trying to stop the Kerbals getting back in space, who will succeed?

Edited February 24, 2015 by Orb8Ter
